heroSection.title: AI-powered ecommerce assistant for both buyers & sellers. Shop smarter. Sell faster.
heroSection.description: Shop smarter. Sell faster. Increase trust and efficiency.

featuresSection.headingBuyer: Discover our Key Features for Buyers
featuresSection.headingSeller: Discover our Key Features for Sellers
featuresSection.description: Empowering your ecommerce experienceâ€”smarter, safer, and more connected.

smartRecommendations.title: Smart Recommendations
smartRecommendations.description: Enjoy personalized AI-powered product recommendations to help you find the perfect items with ease.

virtualTryOn.title: Virtual Try-On
virtualTryOn.description: See how clothes would look on you instantlyâ€”just click one button to try products on virtually using AI.

safeVerifiedSellers.title: Safe & Verified Sellers
safeVerifiedSellers.description: Shop confidently with trusted, verified sellers and secure transactions on every purchase you make.

generateProductImages.title: Generate Product Images
generateProductImages.description: Create stunning, high-quality product images instantly with AI-powered toolsâ€”no photography skills needed.

automatedDescription.title: Automated product description writing
automatedDescription.description: Let AI craft compelling, SEO-optimized product descriptions for every item in your shop automatically.

analyticsInsights.title: Analytics & insights
analyticsInsights.description: Access real-time analytics and insights to track performance, understand customers, and boost your sales.

buyer.heading: Shop Smarter in 4 Simple Steps
buyer.description: Explore, try, and buy with total confidence. See how easy intelligent shopping can be.

step1.title: Sign Up or Log In
step1.description: Create your account in seconds or log in to get instant access to personalized shopping features.

step2.title: Discover & Try
step2.description: Uncover handpicked items with AI-powered recommendations. Instantly try items on virtually for a fun, immersive experience.

step3.title: Shop Confidently
step3.description: Purchase from verified sellers and enjoy a safe, seamless checkout with built-in protection.

step4.title: Track & Receive
step4.description: Track your order in real-time and enjoy fast, reliable delivery right to your door.

seller.heading: Sell Effortlessly with AI in 4 Steps
seller.description: List, grow, and analyze your shop with seamless AI assistance. Start selling in minutes.

step1.title: Register as Seller
step1.description: Set up your seller shop quickly â€” just provide some details and start your journey.

step2.title: Create Listings with AI
step2.description: Effortlessly generate pro product images and descriptions with AI. No studio needed.

step3.title: Attract & Sell
step3.description: Reach active buyers as the AI boosts your visibility. Track interest in real-time.

step4.title: Analyze & Grow
step4.description: Use powerful analytics to boost your shop's performance and confidence.

testimonialsSection.heading: Loved by buyers & sellers.

testimonialsSection.joinThousands: Join thousands of users trusting our AI to power every transaction.
